title: Ep. - 373 - BEHIND THE SCENES OF A&E’S BIGGEST HIT SHOWS
description:
Kate talks about what shows to watch this week in unscripted television including Big Brother, Love Island, and Luxe Listing Sydney.

 

Brad Holcman is Senior Director, Non-Fiction & Alternative Programming for A&E Networks. He is a 4-time Emmy Nominee known for developing and producing some of the most groundbreaking and trailblazing series including 60 Days In, Intervention, Undercover High, and Duck Dynasty. He explains what the role of a network executive includes, the kinds of shows the network champions, and what makes A&E network shows stand alone.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://cameo.com/katecasey
